title: Why are Ashe and Nautilus in the background?
body:
Same for [Nautilus](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uEloAk-yH_k/VNPugpbNlCI/AAAAAAAAji0/kgeJQ3ZswMc/s1600/NautilusLoadScreen_4.png)

Why are the champions in the foreground not removed? It makes them look as if they are playing second fiddle to another champion. The technology is definitely available, just compare Pentakill Morderkaiser in-game splashes.

Please remove Sivir from Nautilus' splash and Warwick from Ashes'.

replies.body: I would just like to point out that {{champion:111}}  is not IN the background of that splash, he IS the background. He's so massive that he fills the entire shot. This is as it should be. I like that they included tiny, unimportant {{champion:15}}  for scale.
I don't think it suboordinates them in any way. The focus shifts rather well to me.

They'd have to do this for every TPA, SKT T1, and FNATIC skin.

Sorry, it's not big of a deal, and not worth stressing over too much. It's just splash, and has no impact on the game.
